text: E'inahu zama hanku Israeli vahe Ra Anumzamo'a anage huno hu'ne, Kagri naga'ene kagehe'i naga'mo'za pristi eri'zana erivava hugahaze hu'na hu'noanagi, anara osugahaze. Na'ankure Nagri'ma ra nagima namisamokizmia, ra zamagi zamigahue. Hagi Nagri nagima eri haviza hanamokizmia, zamazeri henkami atregahue.
